To the back, at the base of Tenas Hill, is the classic hip-roof log barn and corrals with covered chute and cover pens. The majority of the deeded land is cleared and productive with the creek from the lake running through the ranch. Ranch has crown land on three sides. Spring fed domestic water from Gregory Creek and irrigation rights from Tenas Lake. All back-dropped by the surrounding mountain ranges. Also on commercial see MLS #C8018219.

From the double gated driveway, waterfall and colonial exterior to the 28' high ceiling in the entrance foyer, 16,245 sq. ft. of luxurious living space and entertainment wing, this home is amazing.  Situated on a professionally manicured 0.90 acre property, features include 10 bedrooms, 13 bathrooms, 20' high curved wine wall that can hold 1500 bottles, bowling lane, swimming pool, hot tub, pizza oven and too much more to list.   This home is an entertainers dream with 3 bars, entertainment kitchen with seating for 12 guests, 10 person indoor circular fire pit and full home theater.   The show garage of the lower level can accommodate 8 cars beautifully displayed.  Bar none, this is West Van's most impressive residence.
